summary: A giant monster that emits a destructive ray from its back attacks Japan and takes on Gamera.
cast: Kôjirô Hongô|Kyôko Enami|Yûzô Hayakawa|Takuya Fujioka|Kôji Fujiyama|Akira Natsuki|Yoshirô Kitahara|Ichirô Sugai|Bontarô Miake|Jutarô Kitashiro|Kazuko Wakamatsu|Yuka Konno|Eiichi Takamura|Ken'ichi Tani|Kôichi Itô|Hikaru Hoshi|Osamu Abe|Yoshihiro Hamaguchi|Jun Osanai|Joe Ohara|Tsutomu Nakata|Yûji Moriya|Shinji Kawashima|Gai Harada|Kazuo Mori|Yasuo Araki|Shin Minatsu|Takehiko Goto|Toichiro Kagawa|Kenichiro Yamane|Nobuko Shingû|Hiroko Nishi|Michiyo Hikari|Takashi Masuda|Genzô Wakayama|Yukie Kagawa|Teruo Aragaki|Michael Kaye|Warren Rooke|Ted Thomas
title: Los monstruos del fin del mundo
